products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver
products.description: Genie HD DVR is our flagship receiver that lets you watch and record TV, and much more.

products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver + 2 Clients
products.description: 1 Genie® HD DVR receiver for your first TV. 1 Genie® Mini for your second TV.

products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver + 2 Clients
products.description: 1 Genie® HD DVR receiver for your first TV. 2 Genie® Minis for your other TVs.

products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver + 3 Clients
products.description: 1 Genie® HD DVR receiver for your first TV. 3 Genie® Minis for your other TVs.

products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver + 4 Clients
products.description: 1 Genie® HD DVR receiver for your first TV. 4 Genie® Minis for your other TVs.

products.name: Genie® HD DVR receiver + 5 Clients
products.description: 1 Genie® HD DVR receiver for your first TV. 5 Genie® Minis for your other TVs.

products.name: FOX SOCCER PLUS
products.description: Get 24/7 coverage of European and international soccer, rugby and other sports.

products.name: MLB EXTRA INNINGS 2016
products.description: Enjoy up to 100 out-of-market games a week, including up to 99% of those in HD. Plus, you also get Game Mix, giving you eight games on a single screen

products.name: Playboy TV
products.description: Subscribe to Playboy TV and get Playboy TV HD, Playboy TV 2, Playboy TV en Español, and Playboy TV On Demand—all in one package, for one low price.

products.name: NFL SUNDAY TICKET 2016
products.description: Get every out-of-market game of the 2016 season, every Sunday, on your TV. And experience it all in breathtaking High Definition. Plus see up to eight games LIVE at the same on the Game Mix Channel and track up to 18 players in real time with Player Tracker.

products.name: NFL SUNDAY TICKET MAX 2016
products.description: Get every out-of-market game every Sunday in HD on your TV and Game Mix Channel, plus: Every 2016 NFL SUNDAY TICKET game on your computer, tablet, and phone; RED ZONE CHANNEL®, Player Tracker, Short Cuts and NFL SUNDAY TICKET On Demand.

products.name: PROTECTION PLAN
products.description: The DIRECTV PROTECTION PLAN has you covered. An equipment upgrade every 2 years. Complete DIRECTV System coverage: If any part of your DIRECTV system stops working as expected, we’ll troubleshoot, repair, or replace it

products.name: DIRECTV® HD EXTRA PACK
products.description: Add even more amazing HD entertainment to your channel lineup with DIRECTV HD EXTRA PACK. Enjoy blockbuster movies, gripping documentaries, performances by the hottest music stars, and more, on nine channels, all in HD and only in HD.

products.name: DIRECTV SPORTS PACK
products.description: The ultimate add-on package for the ultimate sports fan. Get the best in international sports, MLB Network Strike Zone, Outdoor Channel, plus over 30 Regional Sports Networks—all in one package.
